Summary I graduated from Shri Ram College of Commerce with specialization in Marketing and Advertising. I have been an active participant in College Societies: Dramatics, Commerce Society. I have worked with AIESEC as a Project Head in the Corporate Communications Department managing a team of 3. I have had worked with Start-ups and other firms as my internships.  
I am currently working with Google India Pvt. Ltd as an Associate Account Strategist. I am also the Quality Lead for India team. I work with SMBs across APAC , UK and NA. I am also the Marketing Coordinator for Google Partner Academy 1.0 as a project head.

- Worked with over 1000 Agencies and Individuals in their Adwords Management. 
- Expert in Google Adwords and Analytics. 
- Trainer in Online Advertising and Analytics. 
- Certifications in Business Strategy from University of Virginia, helped Start-ups with marketing and pricing strategies. 
- Like to Travel, explore new places , places, food , photography. 
- Specialities: Communication, Copywriting, Digital Marketing, Project/Process Management, Client Relationship, Business-Strategies, Marketing, Start-Ups Studies, Research.
